openingRemarks: Find the solution to the following equations

questions.question: \(11 = 12 - q \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 11 &= 12 - q \\ 11 - 12 &= -q \\ -1 &= -q \\ \dfrac{-1}{-1} &= \dfrac{-q}{-1} \\ 1 &= q \\ q &= 1 \end{align*} \]
Check 11 = RHS
Evaluate \(12 - q\) if \(q=1\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 12 - 1 \\ &= 11 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(10 = 7 - m \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 10 &= 7 - m \\ 10 - 7 &= -m \\ 3 &= -m\\ \dfrac{3}{-1} &= \dfrac{-m}{-1} \\ -3 &= m \\ m &= -3 \end{align*} \]
Check 10 = RHS
Evaluate \(7 - m\) if \(m=-3\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 7 - (-3) \\ &= 7 + 3 \\ &= 10 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(5 = \dfrac{z}{-4} - 3 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 5 &= \dfrac{z}{-4} - 3 \\ -4 \times 5 &= -4 \times \left(\dfrac{z}{-4} - 3\right) \\ -20 &= z + 12 \\ -20 - 12 &= z \\ -32 &= z \\ z &= -32 \end{align*} \]
Check 5 = RHS
Evaluate \(\dfrac{z}{-4} - 3\) if \(z=-32\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= \dfrac{-32}{-4} -3 \\ &= 8 - 3 \\ &= 5 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(15 - 2x = 3x \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 15 - 2x &= 3x \\ 15 &= 3x + 2x \\ 15 &= 5x \\ \dfrac{15}{5} &= \dfrac{5x}{5} \\ 3 &= x \\ x &= 3 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \(15 - 2x\) if \(x=3\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 15 - 2(3) \\ &= 15 - 6 \\ &= 9 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \(3x\) if \(x=3\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 3(3) \\ &= 9 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(26 - 4s = 9s \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 26 - 4s &= 9s \\ 26 &= 9s + 4s \\ 26 &= 13s \\ \dfrac{26}{13} &= \dfrac{13s}{13} \\ 2 &= s \\ s &= 2 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \(26 - 4s\) if \(s=2\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 26 - 4(2) \\ &= 26 - 8 \\ &= 18 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \(9s\) if \(s=2\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 9(2) \\ &= 18 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(7 + 3x - 12x = 3x + 1 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 7 + 3x - 12x &= 3x + 1 \\ 7 - 1 &= 3x + 12x -3x \\ 6 &= 12x \\ \dfrac{6}{12} &= \dfrac{12x}{12} \\ \frac{1}{2} &= x \\ x &= \frac{1}{2} \text{ or } x = 0.5 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \(7 + 3x - 12x\) if \(x=\frac{1}{2}\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 7 + 3\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right) - 12\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right) \\ &= 7 + \dfrac{3}{2} - 6 \\ &= \dfrac{5}{2} \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \(3x + 1\) if \(x=\frac{1}{2}\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 3\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right) + 1 \\ &= \dfrac{3}{2} + 1 \\ &= \dfrac{5}{2} \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(w - 2 + 2w = 6 + 5w \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} w - 2 + 2w &= 6 + 5w \\ w + 2w - 5w &= 6 + 2 \\ -2w &= 8 \\ \dfrac{-2w}{-2} &= \dfrac{8}{-2} \\ w &= -4 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \(w - 2 + 2w\) if \(w=-4\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= -4 - 2 + 2(-4) \\ &= -6 + (-8) \\ &= -14 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \(6 + 5w\) if \(w=-4\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 6 + 5(-4) \\ &= 6 - 20 \\ &= -14 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(5 = 10 - v \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 5 &= 10 - v \\ v &= 10 - 5 \\ v &= 5 \end{align*} \]
Check 5 = RHS
Evaluate \(10 - v\) if \(v=5\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 10 - 5 \\ &= 5 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(3c + 1 = c + 1 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 3c + 1 &= c + 1 \\ 3c - c &= 1 - 1 \\ 2c &= 0 \\ \dfrac{2c}{2} &= \dfrac{0}{2} \\ c &= 0 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \(3c + 1\) if \(c=0\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 3(0) + 1 \\ &= 0 + 1 \\ &= 0 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \(c + 1\) if \(c=0\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 0 + 1 \\ &= 0 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(4(g + 8) = 7 + 4g \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 4(g + 8) &= 7 + 4g \\ 4g + 32 &= 7 + 4g \\ 32- 7 &= 4g - 4g \\ 25 &= 0 \end{align*} \]
Since \(25 = 0\) is always false, the equation does not have a solution.

questions.question: \(-4(-5h - 4) = 2(10h + 8) \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} -4(-5h - 4) &= 2(10h + 8) \\ 20h + 16 &= 20h + 16 \\ 20h- 20h &= 16 - 16 \\ 0 &= 0 \end{align*} \]
Since \(0=0\) is always true, all numbers satisfy the equation.

questions.question: \(2(h + 1) = 5h - 7 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 2(h + 1) &= 5h - 7 \\ 2h + 2 &= 5h - 7 \\ 2 + 7 &= 5h - 2h \\ 9 &= 3h \\ \dfrac{9}{3} &= \dfrac{3h}{3} \\ 3 &= h \\ h &= 3 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \(2(h + 1)\) if \(h=3\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 2(3 + 1) \\ &= 2(4) \\ &= 8 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \(5h - 7\) if \(h=3\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 5(3) - 7 \\ &= 15 - 7 \\ &= 8 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(k = -6k  - 35\)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} k &= -6k - 35\\ k + 6k &= -35 \\ 7k &= -35 \\ \dfrac{7k}{7} &= \dfrac{-35}{7} \\ k &= -5 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \(k\) if \(k=-5\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= -5 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \(-6k - 35\) if \(k=-5\)
\[ \begin{align*} &= 6(-5) - 35 \\ &= 30 - 35 \\ &= -5 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{3}{4}a - \dfrac{1}{3} = \dfrac{1}{2}a + \dfrac{5}{6} \)
